title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt

title: What to Watch This Week: 60+ Premieres, Finales and More

title: My Life With the Walter Boys Gets Season 2 Release Date at Netflix
description: Jackie and the Walter Boys will be back before summer’s end. My Life With the Walter Boys Season 2 will premiere Thursday, Aug. 28, with all 10 episodes dropping at once. Cast members Nikki Rodriguez (Jackie), Noah LaLonde (Cole) and Ashby Gentry (Alex) announced the release date at the Calgary Stampede on Saturday, where they […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
